CustomField.description: If Employees are paid a fixed amount of wages (or salary) regardless of the hours worked, this field specifies the amount. A separate field specifies the interval of payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Employees are paid a fixed amount of wages (or salary) regardless of the hours worked, this field specifies the amount. A separate field specifies the interval of payment.
CustomField.label: Fixed Amount paid to Employees
